tool_description: This api classifies your job titles into specific job functions
name: job-functions-classifications
title: job-functions-classifications

api_list.name: job-functions-classification
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://job-functions-classifications.p.rapidapi.com/job-functions-classification/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "job-functions-classifications.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
